casebody.data:
Marcia BUTTS, Personal Representative of the Estate of Betty Simms-Norman, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ST. JOHN MACOMB-OAKLAND HOSPITAL, St. John Providence Health System, Seth B. Parker, M.D., and Great Lakes Medicine, PLC, Defendants-Appellants. SC: 158172
COA: 334892 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 4, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 19, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
